Uses of Package
taskallocation

Packages that use taskallocation 
Package Description
taskallocation
Contains all the components required for tasks management amongst workers.
wordcount
This package contains all the resources specific to the WordCount application.
  • Classes in taskallocation used by taskallocation 
    Class Description
    ITaskExecutor
    Interface for the execution to be done by the worker once task is allocated to it by the master.
    ITaskManager
    Interface for the component that manages task allocation and availability.
    NoTaskAvailableException
    Exception thrown when there is no task available to allocate.
    Task
    Represents a single unit of task allocated by the word count master to the worker that it needs to execute and notify completed.
  • Classes in taskallocation used by wordcount 
    Class Description
    ITaskExecutor
    Interface for the execution to be done by the worker once task is allocated to it by the master.
    Task
    Represents a single unit of task allocated by the word count master to the worker that it needs to execute and notify completed.
